verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Amani oh Amani,
Amani oh Amani,
(Tunaimani ya kwamba,
tutapata) x2
Amani

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Upendo oh Upendo,
Upendo oh Upendo,
(Tunaimani ya kwamba,
tutapata) x2
Upendo

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Furaha oh Furaha,
Furaha oh Furaha,
(Tunaimani ya kwamba,
tutapata) x2
Furaha

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
Fadhili ohFadhili,
Fadhili oh Fadhili,
(Tunaimani ya kwamba,
tutapata) x2
Fadhili

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Faraja oh Farajai,
Faraja ohFaraja,
(Tunaimani ya kwamba,
tutapata) x2
Faraja
